page.title: 13EDUCATION:SECONDARY Cont
page.content: with no qualifications at the age of 15. Most of the boys then went to work either on the land or into small boat- building. {TODAY There are now approximatly 630 pupils in attendance, and 36 teachers. The lessons taught are English, Maths, Integrated Science, History,Geography, Drama, R.E., Social Education, Home Economics, Needlecraft, Graphical Design, Multi-media Craft Courses, French, German, Motor Maintenance, Office Practise, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, P.E., Computer Studies, Nautical Studies, and there is a department for those with special learning needs. Few pupils now leave without taking G.C.E., C.S.E. or School-assessed examinations with many going onto Further Education at the sixth form colleges and universities.
